genresAdvancedInfo.name: xhosa
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Xhosa - Xhosa music is a traditional genre originating from the Xhosa people of South Africa. It is characterized by its use of indigenous instruments such as the umrhubhe and the uhadi, and its focus on storytelling through song. Xhosa music often features call-and-response vocals and rhythmic dance beats.
